name: Bolalela 4 by Beyker Soft
description:
BOLALELA 4
                     __________

THE GAME
________

Bolalela is crazy, she can't stop jumping.
Collect the cyan squares and avoid the flashing yellow/red.
The score and screen advance automatically,
you can stop the screen pressing "O" key, but you will lose points if you do so. 
If you press "P" key , the screen will advance faster

Cyan squares will give you 50 extra points
How much score can you get?

CONTROLS: O and P
________

Beyker Soft (c) 2021

For the Basic 10 lines contest 2021
